title: Digital Marketing Fundamentals
content: Learn the core principles of digital marketing including SEO, social media, and content marketing.

title: Data Analysis with Spreadsheets
content: Use spreadsheets to organize, analyze, and visualize data through charts and basic statistics.

title: Effective Communication in the Workplace
content: Improve written, verbal, and active listening skills for professional communication.

title: Basic Programming with Python
content: Explore programming fundamentals using Python, from variables to control structures.

title: Customer Service Excellence
content: Learn strategies to deliver exceptional customer experiences and build lasting loyalty.

title: Introduction to Web Design
content: Learn the basics of UI/UX design, HTML, and CSS to build effective websites..

title: Machine Learning Basics
content: An introduction to machine learning concepts, algorithms, and applications.

title: Visual Graphic Designing
content: Learn the principles of visual design, including color theory, typography, and layout.

title: Project Management Essentials
content: Understand project planning, execution, and monitoring across the project lifecycle.

title: Financial Literacy for Professionals
content: Learn the basics of personal finance, budgeting, and investment strategies.
